member.summary: Provides extension methods for the type that allow configuring webhooks services.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.WebhooksBuilderExtensions.AddSubscriptionsTableStorage(Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.IWebhooksBuilder)
member.summary: Adds an implementation of the webhooks subscription service ( and ) to the builder service collection that uses table storage to store the subscriptions.
member.returns: The instance.
member.remarks: The services are registered as singletons and have a dependency on .

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.WebhooksBuilderExtensions.AddPublisherInProcess(Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.IWebhooksBuilder)
member.summary: Adds an implementation of the webhooks service () to the builder service collection that uses a background service to publish the webhooks events.
member.returns: The instance.
member.remarks: The service is registered as a singleton and has dependencies on and . Notice the following: - If a client application fails to respond to a given webhook callback, that webhook event will not be retried. - If a client application fails to respond () consecutive times to a given webhook callback, the corresponding subscription will be inactivated. - The client application should return a response to the callback before elapses (otherwise it will be considered a failure).

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.WebhooksOptions
member.summary: Defines the configuration options used by webhooks services.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.WebhooksOptions.ApplicationName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the application that provides the webhooks. This option is required.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.WebhooksOptions.EventsSupported
member.summary: Gets or sets the webhooks events supported by the application. This option is required.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.WebhooksOptions.CallbackTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout when invoking webhooks callback actions. This option is required. The default value is 5 seconds.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.WebhooksOptions.CallbackMaxRetries
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of times the callback action will be invoked before the webhook subscription is inactivated. This option is required. The default value is 3.

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.WebhooksOptions.Events
member.summary: Gets or sets the instance of the events triggered by the services.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.WebhooksOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.WebhooksOptions.Validate
member.summary: Validates the configuration options.

member.summary: Provides extension methods for the type that allow configuring webhooks services by initializing a instance.

member.name: M:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.WebhooksServiceCollectionExtensions.AddWebhooks(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the and registers the default implementation of the webhooks subscription service.
member.returns: The instance.
member.remarks: By default the service is registered as a singleton using an implementation that stores webhooks subscriptions in table storage (thus it requires the ). No other webhooks service is registered. The builder instance should be used to register additional services like .

member.summary: Creates a new instance of the and registers the default implementation of the webhooks subscription service.
member.returns: The instance.
member.remarks: By default the service is registered as a singleton using an implementation that stores webhooks subscriptions in table storage (thus it requires the ). No other webhooks service is registered. The builder instance should be used to register additional services like .

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.Properties.Resources.RES_Error_CallbackUrlInvalid
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The callback URI is invalid. It must be an absolute HTTPS URL..

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.Properties.Resources.RES_Error_CallbackUrlRequired
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The callback URL is required..

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.Properties.Resources.RES_Error_ClientIdInvalid
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The client identifier is invalid. Regular expression is '{0}'..

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.Properties.Resources.RES_Error_ClientIdRequired
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The client identifier is required..

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.Properties.Resources.RES_Error_EventAlreadySubscribed
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Event '{0}' cannot be subscribed because it was already subscribed in another webkook subscription..

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.Properties.Resources.RES_Error_EventNameInvalid
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The event name '{0}' is invalid. Regular expression is '{1}'..

member.name: P:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.Properties.Resources.RES_Error_EventNameNotSupported
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The event name '{0}' is not supported..

member.name: T:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.WebhooksHeaderNames
member.summary: Defines the names of the headers that are sent with webhooks.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.WebhooksHeaderNames.ApplicationName
member.summary: The name of the header that identifies the application that triggered the webhook.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.WebhooksHeaderNames.EventName
member.summary: The name of the header that identifies the event that triggered the webhook.

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.WebhooksHeaderNames.Delivery
member.summary: The name of the header that identifies the delivery (typically a unique identifier).

member.name: F:Primavera.Hydrogen.AspNetCore.Webhooks.WebhooksHeaderNames.Signature
member.summary: The name of the header that includes the HMAC hex digest of the payload (typically using a SHA256 hash function and the subscription secret as the HMAC key).
